title.rendered: “Cracking Down on Terrorism: IDF and ISA’s Joint Operation Arrests Top Hamas and PLO Officials at Shifa’ Hospital”

content.rendered:
Joint message from the IDF Spokesperson and the ISA Spokesperson:

IDF and ISA activity in Shifa’: Arrests of senior officials in Hamas and the PLO. A senior official from Hamas’ military intelligence under ISA investigation: “Units of the military intelligence operated from Shifa’ Hospital. So did the Ministry of Interior, emergency committees and the government of Hamas. It was a safe place”.

In the targeted operation by the IDF and the ISA, led by Brigade 162, many terrorists affiliated with terrorist organizations in the Strip were arrested at Shifa’ Hospital, including the deputy commander of the rocket unit in the PLO, senior commanders in Hamas’ military arm and leading figures in the Department of Internal Security and Hamas’ emergency committees. The detainees were transferred to the ISA and Unit 504 for investigation.

Among the detainees at the ISA are many operatives from Hamas’ military intelligence who provide valuable and important information during their interrogations for the continuation of the war against the terrorist organization. These include Ashraf Ibrahim Samur, the deputy head of the Information Department in Hamas’ military intelligence.

Samur describes in his ISA interrogation the numerous bodies of Hamas that operated from inside the hospital, starting with military intelligence, internal bodies, security, and the government of the terrorist organization.

Here’s his interrogation in ISA, by Ashraf Ibrahim Samur, Deputy Head of Information Department in Hamas’ military intelligence: https://bit.ly/3vCnFzo

Here’s the graphic of other terrorists affiliated with the terrorist organization Hamas, who were arrested at Shifa’ Hospital: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC0304202486865

Here’s the graphic of other terrorists affiliated with the PLO, who were arrested at Shifa’ Hospital: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC0304202475696
